findings.title: Owner cannot stop or pause the smart contract
findings.description: The owner of the smart contract does not have the ability to stop or pause the contract.

findings.title: Owner cannot lock or burn the user assets
findings.description: The owner of the contract does not have the capability to lock or burn user assets.

findings.title: Owner cannot blacklist any wallet or stop any wallet from trading
findings.description: The owner of the smart contract does not have the ability to blacklist a wallet or prevent it from trading.

findings.title: Owner cannot mint tokens after initial contract creation/deployment
findings.description: The owner of the smart contract does not have the ability to mint new tokens after the initial deployment.

findings.title: Smart contract owner cannot renounce or transfer contract ownership
findings.description: The smart contract owner does not have the ability to renounce or transfer contract ownership due to the lack of utilization of Ownable.sol library.
